questions.question: What does Ross say he was doing when Rachel came home from work?
questions.explanation: Ross is eating the picnic as Rachel comes home from work.

questions.explanation: Rachel suggests they take a break from their relationship.

questions.explanation: Mark is at Monica and Rachel's apartment when Ross calls.

options: Goes to a club and meets Chloe
questions.correct_answer: Goes to a club and meets Chloe

options: He hides Chloe behind the door

questions.explanation: Monica buys Waxine to wax her legs.

questions.question: Why does Ross try to break the trail?
questions.explanation: Ross tries to break the trail to hide his infidelity from Rachel.

questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that his encounter with Chloe was different.

questions.explanation: Rachel orders a pizza for dinner after her fight with Ross.

questions.explanation: Rachel asks for extra anchovies on the pizza.

questions.question: What does Ross say he would have done if he knew Rachel had slept with Mark?
options: He would have been okay with it
He would have been devastated but still wanted to be with her
He would have broken up with her
He would have cheated on her too
questions.correct_answer: He would have been devastated but still wanted to be with her
questions.explanation: Ross says he would have been devastated but still wanted to be with Rachel if he knew she had slept with Mark.

questions.question: Why does Ross say he cheated on Rachel?
options: Because he thought they were broken up
questions.correct_answer: Because he thought they were broken up
questions.explanation: Ross says he cheated on Rachel because he thought they were broken up.

options: He likes it the way it is
questions.explanation: Joey says he wants to change his walk.

questions.question: What do Monica and Phoebe use to wax their legs?
questions.explanation: Monica and Phoebe use Waxine to wax their legs.

questions.question: What does Chandler say about monogamy?
questions.explanation: Chandler quotes Issac as saying monogamy is too cruel a rule.

questions.question: Who does Ross try to stop from telling Phoebe about his infidelity?
questions.explanation: Ross tries to stop Jasmine from telling Phoebe about his infidelity.

options: That he was in love with Chloe
That he was angry with Rachel
That he thought they were broken up

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross when he tries to explain his actions?
options: That she never wants to see him again
That she wants to work through their issues
That she wants to take a break
questions.correct_answer: That she wants to work through their issues
questions.explanation: Rachel implies that she wants to work through their issues with Ross.

questions.explanation: Joey says he's hungry and likes pizza.

questions.explanation: Monica tells Joey that he can't leave the bedroom.

options: That they're not meant to be
